website_summaries.verdict: A nice ceiling fan from a reliable brand that looks great and is easy to install.
pros: Reversible blades offer medium or dark wood finish
We found this fan moves a lot of air and is quiet
cons: However, they are included in the purchase

customer_reviews.title: This fan has GREAT instructions, and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and installation of this fan was easy compared to the disaster I had with the Hampton Bay fan I bought at Home Depot, and returned. I struggled through the spelling errors in the Hampton Bay instructions and finally (after 2 hours) found that the fan didn't work. This Hunter fan has great instructions. They are clear, accurate, understandable, and written by an English speaker. The hardware is not all mixed into the same bag. Each page in the manual directs you to a specific plastic bag which contains the hardware needed to complete the steps on that page. The fan assembled easily and it works great. Any future fans I buy will be Hunters.
customer_reviews.author: JEH

customer_reviews.title: Boosted my star rating.... excellent dinner convewrsation was reward...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my mother - in law's fan with this one. Boosted my star rating with her to a max level with this one. This is a best value product delivered very timely by Amazon. Came with 99 percent of required parts. Had to use an adapter plate to fit her older house ceiling junction box but mate up was slick. All the fans in my home are Hunters. Can afford more expensive but why do so when Hunter works well for me?
customer_reviews.author: XXXXXXXX

customer_reviews.title: Two failed w/in a week of each other after 6 years of life
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in December of 2014 and in April of 2020 both motors on both fans failed. They started making grinding noises and started to smell of overheating. The fan speed was not that great in my opinion. On the other hand, I moved into my house in 2/2014 and had a ceiling fan installed in my living room and it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: The light part is absolutely awefull and puts out no notable light! Read Review - Returning
customer_reviews.text: As a fan, it works just fine. The lighting portion is absolutely terrible. The ad listing does not clearly explain that it takes two little Christmas light based light bulbs that don't put out any notable amount of light at all and because of the unique fixture base of these bulbs you cannot put a larger wattage light bulb in it. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: James W Lee

customer_reviews.title: It is fine, cannot tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: I fussed over whether chandelier light would be adequate. It is fine, cannot tell the difference. nice and bright: Rich solid looking fan. This is my second hunter fan. One in the kitchen, one in the living room. Kitchen is on a remote, Living room is wired to switch. Both perfectly suited to their environment. I had my contractor install both and they are even, free of wobble , and a nice addition to both rooms. I am inclined to stick with hunter in the future, they have lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a nice update to my family room. It is well balanced and runs very quietly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fan
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these fans first one the light never worked, the second one the light worked for 1.5 years. the third one is still working. Like I put in my heading it is a beautiful fan but make sure to put it up quickly to make sure the lights work. For us 129 dollars is not a bad price but I know that for some this is an expensive fan so just buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fan for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was to replace an old bronze broken one in my main living room. It is exactly what I wanted. It is pretty and sleek. The motor is completely silent and it moves a ton of air. The light is great even with only two small bulbs. The walnut color of the blades is rich and the wood grain is beautiful. The brushed nickel matches my other fixtures perfectly. I'm very happy with the quality and would deffinetely buy a Hunter again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: So-so quality, wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality, you get what you paid for. Takes A LOT of effort to get them looking straight and never perfectly straight. Two out of the five we ordered wobble when spinning. Good thing they were in the kids room so I don't care so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dante the Great

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while, then problems!
customer_reviews.text: Decent fan, works well. Unfortunately, the light is really weak and not good for any room. 2 bulbs just doesn’t cut it. Also, the light fixture broke and is useless. Wires are hot, but no light. $200 from an electrician to tell me that! Could have replaced the whole thing for less.
customer_reviews.author: Brian / Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and easy to install. Seems to be a much better build than the Hampton Bay model I replaced because of a bad motor after 10 days. I've owned other Hunter fans and my wife and I have to sleep with it on all year round. They hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Easy but Lacks A Little
customer_reviews.text: The set up on this is fairly straight forward. Very durable materials. The only issue I have is the lack of power it has. It provides quite a bit of speed but not as much as my previous one. Light is good but not great. Requires almost no balancing.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Black

customer_reviews.title: Oh, blessed sleep in a cooling breeze. After ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, blessed sleep in a cooling breeze. After I moved, my new bedroom didn't have a ceiling fan, but now it does, and my electric bill is much lower - plus it is SILENT!
customer_reviews.author: L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! No idea how I lived without it. It's beautiful, quiet and functional. I have used all the speeds for varying conditions..heat wave, just a little air flow, etc. Though the light is not bright enough to read by, it's perfect to give a bit of ambient light to the room so I don't trip over my sleeping dog. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks and works decent. However, the lights suck! It basically comes with two Christmas lights and even with 60w daylight LEDs, it is really dim. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fan!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a big fan (no pun intended) of Hunter fans and had them installed throughout my house. We recently moved & purchased a new house and purchased Hunter fans again. They are relatively easy to install and are so quiet! Great quality fan for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MrsAllisonS

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this fan
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this fan. I ordered three for my whole house and they look really rich and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good fan, especially for the price. Very quiet even at full speed. Instructions are not perfect, but are good enough. Possible to install with one person. Much easier with 2.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth unit I have installed myself in the last 3 years. Each of these has been great to have and are very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: rskinva

customer_reviews.title: Works good save 10 bucks by not buying it at Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: Works good save 10 bucks by not buying it at Lowe’s
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very slow, does not push a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and is very quiet, however, it simply does not push a lot of air. Even at the highest setting, its quite slow. My $16 honeywell table fan blows more air at its lowest speed than this one does at the highest speed. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik Krishnaswamy

customer_reviews.title: My kind of ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fan that moved slowly for a new addition. After reading customer reviews (some complaining about the low speed) I decided that this was the product for me. Have it installed now (very simple & and straightforward directions) and it was just what I wanted. Very quiet and soothing. In the South we like things at a slower pace!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Broken Globe - Can't Return
customer_reviews.text: 3 fans were ordered, placed aside, installed last weekend, and one of the globes was broken. The fan has been installed without the globe, and I have no recourse to return the item anyway. The fans look and work great, though there's a lot of assembly required, and they do not truely have a "flush" fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Elson

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As one reviewer said " the sound of silence". Couldn't have said it better myself. Take your time putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Description said dark walnut, and Medium walnut,
customer_reviews.text: Description said dark walnut, and Medium walnut, ( both sides of blades were very dark in color) had to order a new set of blades from Hunter in different color (white) was only other choice
customer_reviews.author: RHughes188

customer_reviews.title: The fan looks and works great. the light however has low light output due ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks and works great. the light however has low light output due to the 2 small candlabra style lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Gall

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and nice. I replaced the candelabra bulbs with 60W leds ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and nice. I replaced the candelabra bulbs with 60W leds and like it much better.
customer_reviews.author: MGWarr

customer_reviews.title: item never worked.
customer_reviews.text: the order arrived and motor in fan did not work. had two people try to install it and both said the motor was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: saul gold

customer_reviews.title: NICE, good build and materials
customer_reviews.text: NICE, good build and materials. Owned over a year. Brushed nickel matches my other hardware and dark espresso blades match perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Does not move as much air as Hunter Orginal; great price
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big and solid but it does wobble slightly when the fan is on high
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks great in my newly painted bedroom and is reasonably quiet
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my newly painted bedroom and is reasonably quiet. Quiet enough to have on all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Sewjoy

customer_reviews.title: Tip for installation
customer_reviews.text: Second one, I've purchased. Ease to install, but I do wrap the top with plastic wrap so small screws don't fall into the fan motor during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Julius P. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, well made, and quiet. Install was easy and straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hajjar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I had a Harbor Breeze that was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I had a Harbor Breeze that was the same design and it would make a humming sound. I took it down and bought this Hunter and installed it myself the same as the Harbor Breeze. The Hunter is TOTALLY quiet! I would buy it again most definitly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! The fan is of excellent quality. No noise!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and silent as can be
customer_reviews.text: Hunter is always the way to go. Easy to install and silent as can be. Not a huge source of light. If your looking for this to be the only light it probably won't do the trick. But it's great for most applications
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. Works well in our master bedroom and silent.
customer_reviews.author: LShu5

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan is great, but light is dim for a 10 foot ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Bear Hart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look really nice and work well. not a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: ruthann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fan is beautiful and runs quietly. It is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rurycz

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous fan, well made
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks great in our new kitchen. It's a bit large for the size of our space (about 100 sq ft), but it still looks great. It's modern looking without being too much so. The domed light is so much less harsh than the lights on our last ceiling fan, which were pendants.
customer_reviews.author: coppertop

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It was exactly what I expected and it was easy to put together and hang.
customer_reviews.author: AKMom

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and beautiful appearance.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and super quiet fan. With 11' ceiling, I used a 24" down rod and the darker side of the blades to go with my dark walnut floors and dark fireplace surround. Transitional styling. The bulbs that came with the fan are not very bright for my large room. If you want to be perfectly happy, you might want brighter bulbs. Having said that, I'm very pleased with my purchase. :-) when bulbs burn out, I'll buy ones with more watts.
customer_reviews.author: TrishInHouston

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fans. Would definitely order again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fans. Would definitely order again. One of the light covers came broken, Amazon had another one to me in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McBride

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks great and it is so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Fitscher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good, arrived on time, just doesn't go as fast as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sloboda

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality. Easy installation. Just what I was looking for.Also the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: michael mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Of the two I bought, one was damaged in ...
customer_reviews.text: Of the two I bought, one was damaged in the box despite the packaging showing no signs or damage. It claims to support angled ceilings up to 34 degrees, but my ceiling is only angled 14 degrees and it can not be mounted flush.
customer_reviews.author: Fake As Hell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very quiet and attractive. fan speed could be faster- low setting provides very little air movement.
customer_reviews.author: YSS GenX

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My globe was broken on fan ! Ended up having to buy the replacement 50.00
customer_reviews.author: jamie jernigan

customer_reviews.title: assembled easily, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, assembled easily, looks great, works great. Didn't use the light provided- we installed a custom light using the light kit. We installed a wireless remote, that works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged fan
customer_reviews.text: I am going to keep this fan but do not send used or damaged products to me again!!!
customer_reviews.author: GLENN MARTIN

product_meta.title: Hunter Indoor Ceiling Fan with light and pull chain control - Banyan 52 inch, Brushed Nickel, 53175
product_meta.description: The banyan casual ceiling Fan completes the look of your large indoor rooms while keeping your space cool and comfortable. This indoor ceiling Fan features three speeds and WhisperWind. Motor technology to deliver quiet and powerful performance. Available in three finishes, the banyan will keep the style of your rooms consistent throughout the home.
feature_bullets: WhisperWind motor delivers ultra-powerful air movement with whisper-quiet performance so you get the cooling power you want without the noise you don’t
Reversible motor allows you to change the direction of your fan from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
5 Dark Walnut / Medium Walnut Reversible blades included
13 degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance
3" and 2" downrods included to ensure proper distance from the ceiling and optimize air movement at your preferred blade height
Included pull chain allows for quick and easy on/off and speed adjustments
Limited Lifetime Motor Warranty is backed by the only company with over 125 years in the fan business

specifications.Special Features: Can be installed without the light kit
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
